Author: akira0245, Ori, Kalle, Zune
Name: MidiBard 2 (BETA)
Punchline:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Description:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
- Solo and ensemble mode support
- Text commands for instrument equip and switch
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Changelog:
Rewriting old midibard code into new dalamud api windows system
 - Enabled Lyrics for solo bards
 - New Piano Roll view (WIP)
 - Add echo chat as test output lyrics / song name post
 Add start stop (solo ensemble) via party chat PMD

Author: Zune
Name: Master Of Puppets
Description: FFXIV plugin that lets you create and send custom actions (similar to in-game macros), either locally or via chat-based broadcast. It supports broadcasting actions to multiple clients locally, or through in-game chat channels such as Party, Linkshell, and Cross-World Linkshell. Use it to trigger custom actions like emotes, minions, mounts, fashion changes, and more.
